title: Reverse Logistics Market Size & Share, Growth Trends 2023-2032 - Global Market Insights
summary: The reverse logistics market is growing due to increasing environmental awareness, the growth of e-commerce, and the adoption of circular economy principles. title: NewRoad Capital Partners hires former Walmart exec Bob Arvin - talkbusiness.net
summary: NewRoad Capital Partners, Arkansas’ largest private equity fund, has hired Bob Arvin as a strategic advisor. Arvin has over 45 years of leadership and supply chain experience, including more than four decades at Walmart where he worked in strategy, engineering, building design, network design and operational responsibility for many of the retailer’s logistics functions. Arvin is a past board advisor to the Reverse Logistics Association and holds a master’s degree in operations management from the University of Arkansas.
green_innovation: TRUE, Arvin's work in sustainability programs to divert plastics and other materials from landfills to new products in the returns channel is a green innovation.

title: Circularity and Frugal Innovation in the Making of a Sustainable Future - APAC Outlook Magazine
summary: Companies can make products faster and more efficiently by reusing, recycling and refurbishing products. Circularity can bring new opportunities for partnership and innovation by developing new circular systems and exploring the right partnerships. Businesses can generate new revenue streams and save on operating expenses by creating upgradable offers that are circular and easily repairable.

title: Stellantis SUSTAINera at MEMA Sustainability Summit: Circular Economy business plays key role in global ... - Stellantis.com
summary: Stellantis' SUSTAINera Circular Economy initiative aims to achieve carbon net zero by 2038 through its 4-R strategy (Reman, Repair, Reuse and Recycle). The initiative focuses on extending product lifespan, increasing recycling, and offering sustainable parts to customers. Stellantis is expanding its remanufacturing portfolio, investing in core return management, and launching an e-commerce Reuse channel in North America.
green_innovation: TRUE, as the SUSTAINera Circular Economy initiative is an innovative approach to reducing environmental impact and promoting sustainability in the automotive industry.
business_innovation: TRUE, as the 4-R strategy involves the development of new business models and processes to support the circular economy, such as the expansion of remanufacturing and the launch of the Reuse e-commerce channel.
green_product: TRUE, as the remanufactured parts and reused parts offered through the SUSTAINera Circular Economy initiative are designed to reduce waste, conserve resources, and minimize environmental impact.
green_process: TRUE, as the remanufacturing and recycling processes involved in the SUSTAINera Circular Economy initiative are designed to minimize waste, conserve resources, and reduce emissions.
